mapper.select: SELECT id, full_name, phone, email, created_at, updated_at FROM tenants ORDER BY full_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenants (full_name, phone, email) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE tenants SET full_name = #{fullName}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
